Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
model.Medicine
public class Medicine extends Object
The Medicine class represents a medicine in the hospital management system. It contains information about the medicine's name, current stock, low stock alert level, and status.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    currentStock
    The current stock level of the medicine.
    private int
    lowStockAlert
    The low stock alert level for the medicine.
    private String
    medicineName
    The name of the medicine.
    private String
    status
    The status of the medicine (e.g., Available, Low, Pending).
